title: Brand Management Professional
subtitle: Master the principles of brand management, including brand strategy, positioning, and equity
description: Master the principles of brand management, including brand strategy, positioning, and equity. Learn to create and sustain strong brands that resonate with consumers and drive business success.

certification.name: Brand Management Professional (BMP)
certification.authority: The National Society of Business Sciences

learningOutcomes: Master brand strategy architecture and positioning frameworks
Develop comprehensive brand identity and messaging systems
Create integrated customer experience and brand orchestration strategies
Design effective brand portfolio management approaches
Implement brand measurement and valuation methodologies
